snippet.title: Crumbling Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/k3PPEQ54W6
Get it from SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/3488/crumbling
Get it from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1701870/Crumbling/

Whoosh! Bam! Pow! Remember playing with action figures? Unwrap your Crumbling from its blister package and take its fate into your hand - quite literally. 

Crumbling is a VR rogue-like action adventure. You fight plastic monsters that are minions of the evil Böse Corp. As you progress from one meticulously crafted diorama to the next your Crumbling grows ever stronger!
